titleStmt.title: An ordinance of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament with the names of the knights and gentlemen entrusted in every county to bring up a speedy account of the weekely assessment and to returne the names of all such persons as refuse to pay : also the instructions agreed upon by both Houses for the said gentlemen appointed for this service.
Laws, etc.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
